author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia finance ministry to offer 30.09 billion rubles of OFZ bonds on Wednesday
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russiaâ€™s Finance Ministry said on Tuesday it would offer 30.09 billion rubles ($492 million) worth of OFZ treasury bonds at two auctions on Wednesday.
FILE PHOTO: A woman holds new 200 and 2,000 rouble banknotes in a bank in Moscow, Russia November 21, 2017. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov The ministry said it would offer 15 billion rubles of OFZs maturing in February 2024 RU26223=MM and 15.093 billion rubles of OFZs maturing in February 2028 RU52002=MM.
Reporting by Andrey Ostroukh; editing by Polina Devitt
